title: Sell Advance Parking Pass
description: A customer who has already purchased event tickets wants to add a pre-paid parking pass to their order.

tasks.description: Look up the customer's existing ticket order.
Add a parking pass for the main lot to their order.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully adds the parking pass to the customer's cart.

tasks.description: Process the payment for the parking pass.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent charges the customer's card on file for the pass.

tasks.description: Send an updated order confirmation including the digital parking pass.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent emails the parking pass to the customer.
